premium_limit_message: You have {count} contacts, but free version only allows backup of first {limit} contacts.
premium_upgrade_message: Upgrade to premium to backup all your contacts.
dark_theme_subtitle_on: Dark theme active. Easier on the eyes, saves battery.
dark_theme_subtitle_off: Light theme active. Brighter and traditional interface.
dark_theme_hint: Dark theme makes your eyes less tired in low light environments.
backup_contacts_desc: Backup your contacts in different formats
restore_contacts_desc: Restore your previously backed up contacts
export_success_message: Your contacts have been successfully exported and shared.
contacts_permission_message: We need permission to access your contacts to backup or restore them.
app_description: This application allows you to backup and restore your contacts. You can backup your contacts in vCard, CSV, Excel, PDF and JSON formats. Also, you can send your backups to email or cloud storage services.
onboarding_subtitle_1: The safest way to backup your contacts
onboarding_subtitle_2: Export your contacts in different formats like vCard, CSV, Excel, PDF and JSON
vcard_desc: Contact format compatible with all devices
csv_desc: Simple table format - Compatible with Excel and similar programs, data organized in columns and rows
excel_desc: Microsoft Excel format - Rich data analysis with editing and filtering capabilities
pdf_desc: Printable document format - Looks the same on all systems, suitable for digital documents
json_desc: Programmable data format - Widely used data structure for web and mobile applications
